name: domponent
description: Build components with the HTML you already have.

scripts.deploy: node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/html-prod && npm install && webpack && cd ../../ && gh-pages -d examples/html-prod
scripts.build:html-prod: node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/html-prod && npm install && npm start
scripts.build:html-dev: node clean.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js && npm pack && cd examples/html-dev && npm install && webpack && firefox index.html

author: tamb
